Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: I'd suggest fix HasMore function in FAB-8103. And fix the nil response in FAB-8115. I believe this is what the reporter intended.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Ok, I'll go ahead and close since it will be handled in FAB-8103. Please re-open after FAB-8103 verification if something else is needed.
